message: I don't believe so, there two entirely different devices. Iphone 4 and iPad came out around the same time and both sold exceptionally well, even given the "antennagate" issue. I think ultimately both devices will again sell really well.
I'm really happy with my iPhone 4 so they will need to come out with something really special for me to upgrade.
@rcs  Me too.  Yea, like a waterproof or neural implant model.
